name: Qnity Reciprocal
slogan: Intelligent P2P insurance management platform used by local brokers

team.name: Diego Rios
team.bioHtml: COO at @The Influence. Strong business background (Dimagi, MFIC, Chamba)

team.name: Diego Rios
team.bioHtml: I love what I do for a living. I see risk management as the adviser that has intimate understanding of what makes a company tick, her systems, actors and...

jobs.title: CTO
jobs.description:
Stage:
Qnity is an early stage insurtech startup.

What we do:
We aim to empower the end customer (policyholders) as well as intermediaries (brokers) to build insurance products that fit their needs that are organized in cliques (we call them Qliks) 
At the same time we dynamically match Qliks with insurance and reinsurance companies to have achieve the best prices and conditions.

What we are doing:
We are very excited about our concept, even more as we've recently have been selected to be part for Lloyd's of London first-ever innovation cohort.
Within the Lloyd’s program we aim to produce the following:
A platform interface for insurance product design, and
An matching script that dynamically matches supply (reinsurance) and demand (Qlik)
Both outputs are meant to be an alpha-version to collect input from prototype testers to be agreed with Lloyd's
This is meant to be the beginning of a very ambitious development route which, with your help.

What we plan to use:
A mix of Java, Javascript, Python, R, PHP among others
H20 & Tensorflow
Existing open source code

Who you are:
A mix of programmer and architect; a plus if you have good UX skills.

Opportunity and Compensation:
We have done some lifting already and have managed to be endorsed by the world’s biggest insurance market - Lloyd’s of London. 
We are in the process of approaching angels and venture funds to complement the investment option that Lloyd’s has set of itself.
Compensation is equity, based on experience and an annual salary to be discussed once we obtain the funding targets.
You also have the opportunity to influence shaping the company. 
You will be the third employee and heavily weigh in the technological aspect of the business.



What to Do & Time Frame:
Email your resume, any links to projects you've worked on and any relevant information at diego.rios@qnityre.com  
We are moving quickly on this and plan to assess competent candidates within the following weeks. 
Ideally you're a hungry entrepreneur at heart that will join us. However, we know that sometimes that is not necessarily possible, so be sure to let us know what your schedule is like and how much time can you feasible dedicate to our project.. 

Other:
The Lloyd's Lab program runs 8 weeks, from 8 Oct - 12 Dec. As part of the program, we will have access to desks at Lloyd's, mentorship by at least one Lloyd's member, access to the syndicates, and some goodies that Lloyd's Lab has negotiated (e.g. 10K in AWS credits).
Also, there is an option for Lloyd's to invest at the end of the program.
